title: Crash when font: x: #someLargeNegativeNumber
body:
Alacritty crashes when I set x offset of the font a large negative number like -10.


### System

OS: Linux
Version: 0.5.0
Linux/BSD: Manjaro MATE

### Logs

Crashes: SIGABRT

Font/Terminal size: Fullscreen, no decorations, Fira NERD Font:11, x:-10(yes), y:0
Keyboard and bindings: `alacritty --print-events`


Created log file at "/tmp/Alacritty-80782.log"
